tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (NP (PRP$ My) (JJS best) (NN friend)) (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VBG leaving) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT the) (NNPS Philippines))) (PP (IN for) (NP (DT a) (NN month) (NN :'-LRB-)))))) (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP have) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB say) (NP (NN bye)) (NP-TMP (NN tonight)))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [have/VBP dep>[leaving/VBG nsubj>[friend/NN nmod:poss>My/PRP$ amod>best/JJS] aux>is/VBZ nmod:to>[Philippines/NNPS case>to/TO det>the/DT] nmod:for>[:'-LRB-/NN case>for/IN det>a/DT compound>month/NN]] nsubj>I/PRP xcomp>[say/VB mark>to/TO dobj>bye/NN nmod:tmod>tonight/NN] punct>!/.]
